title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: help I am in need of League of Legends and I can't get on

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel Error are usually an indication that League has not been granted certain administrative privileges that it relies on in order to operate normally. I strongly recommend [configuring your system permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for league properly in order to resolve this issue.

Let me know if this helped.
